analysis: Selected picks optimize uncorrelated value: 4 NCAAB legs with perfect confidence (diverse factors: sharp money, tempo, narrative) + 1 NHL anchor. Avoided lower-confidence NCAAB games (e.g., Minnesota Golden Gophers at 0.847) and prioritized teams with multi-model consensus. Excluded overlapping matchups (e.g., multiple mid-majors) to reduce systemic risk. Parlay leverages 'deepseek_meta' dominance (70% weight) while maintaining sport/context diversity.
